CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 3, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Americans All! Enjoying the social hour after the ceremonies which marked the first anniversary of the Interracial Action Council at Hotel Henry Monday evening are, left to right: Miss Helen Clarke, Dr. S. H. Kaufman, Frederick Homes, Mrs. Leona Kaufman, Dr. Verne Wright, Miss Cecelia Steinlein and Miss Edith Carson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Interracial Action Council, from left: Helen Clarke, Dr. S. H. Kaufman, Frederick Holmes, Leona Kaufman, Dr. Verne Wright, Cecelia Steinlein, and Edith Carson, gathered in Hotel Henry bar
